Text:
Special note:
Publisher got bad hands, so game shortcut is buggy. 
Game will not work from it ^^
U can fix it easily - just delete word "video" from
work directory into shortcut properties.      
Work directory that is correct -                          X:\\Program Files\\Buka\\Collapse the Rage
Thanks Ex_Exist, it might only be in russian but this game is actually really enjoyable
